results.title: Judd Hirsch Can Tell You a Story or Three. ‘The Fabelmans’ Is Just the Latest.
results.abstract: The veteran actor has been singled out for his rousing performance in Steven Spielberg’s drama. It’s the latest chapter in a long career full of anecdotes.

multimedia.caption: Judd Hirsch said he didn’t understand why he gets some parts and not others, “but I’m old enough to know that’s OK.”

results.title: Golden Globes Announce 2023 Nominations After Recent Troubles
results.abstract: The tarnished awards ceremony will air on NBC in January in a one-year trial. But which stars will show up to collect their trophies?

results.title: ‘Guillermo del Toro’s Pinocchio’ Review: Puppets and Power
results.abstract: This quirky classic has been made all the stranger by the decision to turn it into an ill-conceived metaphor about fascism.

multimedia.caption: Pinocchio (voiced by Gregory Mann) and Count Volpe (voiced by Christoph Waltz). Nothing makes the wooden puppet more wholly, recognizably human than his disobedience and repeated mistakes.

results.title: Highbrow Films Aimed at Winning Oscars Are Losing Audiences
results.abstract: The kind of critically praised dramas that often dominate the awards season are falling flat at the box office, failing to justify the money it takes to make them.

multimedia.caption: Cate Blanchett stars in “Tár,” which cost at least $35 million to make and market. Like other prestige dramas, it hasn’t come close to covering its costs with ticket sales.
Cate Blanchett stars in “Tár,” which cost at least $35 million to make and market. Like other prestige dramas, it hasn’t come close to covering its costs with ticket sales.

results.title: When Jewish Artists Wrestle With Antisemitism
results.abstract: In this unsettling moment, comedians, filmmakers, playwrights and others have been struggling against a long-ingrained American response to look away.

results.title: Playing Santa Onscreen Takes Much More Than Just Donning a Red Suit
results.abstract: David Harbour, George Wendt and Tim Allen explain the acting challenge that is Jolly St. Nick.

multimedia.caption: David Harbour as Santa in “Violent Night”: “It was a lot of digging in and trying to create a character and an arc that would be meaningful,” he said.

results.title: Is Sight and Sound’s List of 100 Greatest Films Too Tasteful?
